_meta.title: forest_a six baselines, 20 runs, grouped figures (MPC2 horizon-local-planner)
_meta.summary: Evaluate A*, A*-MPC2, Hybrid A*, Hybrid A*-MPC2, RRT*, and RRT-MPC2 using horizon-based MPC2 local planning with trajectory-window optimization.
notes: MPC2 solver now optimizes a horizon steering sequence over local-replanned trajectory windows instead of one-step steering scoring.
Collision cost is evaluated across the predicted horizon with the repository two-circle collision interface.
For strict A/B comparison with historical group4 pairs, pass --rand-pairs-json /tmp/forest_a_pairs20_from_20260207_004053.json.
